TopicTitle: JellyCubes Advanced Weapons R&D - Weapons and Other Miscellanea

Articles.Content:
Hi,

so i not long got the missile and the barrel gun, but when ever i make a space plane and put a missile on with a decoupler, it launches the missile before i even take off in a heli. anyideas??

and for the barrel gun i dont know where to get any ammo...

i have the full game and tried making a heli / apache after i saw someone make a apache replica....

after i have launched my missiles (before i have taken off) now when ever i take off it will do back summersaults whilst turning to the right.

any answers will be very helpful

You have to change the staging derp.

Hey guys!

I have problems with firing on targets!

When I shoot at a plane or rocket or something else the projectiles explode but dont do any damage?

Could somone help me?

Edit: The projectiles don't even hit the subject they fly through (the reason why i said they hit the things is because they hit the ground :/)

Edited October 2, 2012 by Gul4sch
Correction

Thread closed. Please look up the successors to this mod:

Lazor guided weapons

Pirated weaponry
